thing.title: Coat hook
thing.author: Erik
thing.description: This is Adrian Bowyer's coat hook. Initially blogged here: blog.reprap.org/2008/05/economics-n-pl-management-of-household.htmlAlso printed by nophead here: blog.reprap.org/2008/06/abs-coat-hook.htmlWhat's interesting is that (by Adrian):- The hook can support more than 10 kg (then I ran out of weights...)- It cost me about 15 pence [less than 18 ct. in euros]
